sentences.sentence: Many of the drivers who used to give him larger tips of around 100 gourde ($2.50) no longer drive past.
sentences.translation: 那些曾经给过他超过100古德（2.5美元）小费的司机们再也不会从这经过了。

sentences.sentence: Many of his relatives are living in tents. Also, many of the drivers who used to give him larger tips of around 100 gourde ($2.50) no longer drive past.
sentences.translation: 他的邻居大部分都住在帐篷里，而那些曾经给过他超过100古德（2.5美元）小费的司机们再也不会从这经过了。
